url.description: The site or page which the notification refers to. Opening this URL should be the default action for the notification if it is provided

icon.description: URL for icon to show in the notificatio

preview.description: URL to a large icon, used for rich notifications on Android Wear and Chrome extension

actions.description: List of possible Actions to take from the notification

icon.description: URL to an icon for the action

path.description: HTTP REST path that client should use when activating the action

method.description: HTTP method to use for the call

payload.description: Object to pass as payload to when activating action
